name: Pokemon Sol e Lua: Luta contra a equipe rocket
name_original: Pokemon Sol e Lua: Luta contra a equipe rocket
description:
Pokemon Sol e Lua: Luta contra a equipe rocket is a shooter game developed by Bcgrabner. It came out on 03-07-2020. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Pokemon Sol e Lua: Luta contra a equipe rocket on PC and macOS. The game is sold via itch.io.
